mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (id, openid, name, phone, sex, id_number, avatar, create_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{openid}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{sex}, #{idNumber}, #{avatar}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT DATE(create_time) AS date,COUNT(0) AS newUserCount FROM user WHERE create_time >= #{begin} AND create_time < #{endPlusOne} GROUP BY DATE(create_time) ORDER BY date
